title.rendered: Top 10 Digital Marketing Institutes in Central Delhi

content.rendered:
[vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column][vc_column_text]If you are looking for the best digital marketing institutes in Central Delhi, then you have come to the right place. Digital marketing has become the most profitable career path in the modern world. Now, businesses are using digital ways to interact with their customers. Digital marketing enables businesses to promote their products and services and provides a platform to interact with clients and offer them the best possible solution. A report by McKinsey Global Institute (MGI) reveals that digital marketing will produce 60-65 million new Digital marketing jobs in India by the year 2025. The total digital spending is growing at a really fast pace. Consequently, a lot of people want to build a career in this field. That raises a question! Who provides the best digital marketing course in Delhi? If you live in Delhi, and searching for the best digital marketing institute, particularly for the central Delhi location then you should check the below-mentioned list of the top 10 digital marketing institutes in Central Delhi also if you live in any other parts of Delhi, we have curated a list of the top digital marketing course in other locations as well. Top 10 Digital Marketing Institutes In South Delhi Top 10 Digital Marketing Institutes In North Delhi Top 10 Digital Marketing Institutes In West Delhi Top 10 Digital Marketing Institutes In East Delhi But before sharing the list of institutes offering digital marketing courses in central Delhi, let’s look at the benefits of pursuing digital marketing courses in today’s era.  

Step into the Journey of Digital Marketing With Best Training Insitute in Central Delhi

Want Kick-Start Career in Digital Marketing in Delhi?

Book Free Career Counselling 
SUBMIT DETAILS
JOIN TODAY
We respect your privacy.
Powered by ConvertPlugâ¢

   

Benefits of Digital Marketing Courses

Being one of the most demanding career options in the world, the field of digital marketing is expanding rapidly with the opportunities of creating a job for many individuals all over the world. So, it’s high time for you to choose a career in the Digital Marketing field.

1. Wide range of Career opportunities

One of the major advantages of choosing a career in digital marketing is that it does not restrict you to work in one specific field, you can easily choose the best career for yourself from the various modules of Digital Marketing like SEO, SMM, SMO, Google AdWords, and so on. Thus, it totally depends on you to set a career in the module that goes well with your needs and interests.

2. Get a High Salary Package

This is the major perk for you if you pursue a digital marketing course as it provides you with the benefits of getting a high salary package. If you are someone with a strong skill set and expertise in any module of digital marketing, then you can easily rise over with your colleagues and achieve a position where you will easily be able to earn a decent amount that will lead to a fruitful life & enhance your living condition.

3. Flexibility with timing

Another perk I have found while working in the field of digital marketing is that it provides you with flexible work timings. Since the whole digital marketing thing is totally Internet-based marketing, it totally allows you to work from the comfort of your own location and you will still be able to do your job effectively and efficiently, all you need to have is a good internet connection.

4. Develop Skills and Opportunities

With the constantly evolving field, digital marketing will always put you in the learning mindset, which will help you to get excellent opportunities to gain new skills and expand your knowledge consistently in the digital world. Enrolling in a digital marketing course will provide you with various relevant industry concepts, skills, and practical experience that will enhance your to develop marketing strategies in various fields and industries.

5. Work with Multiple Industries

With the expansion of digital marketing, you will have a great opportunity to work with multiple industries and clients like automobile brands, education sectors, fashion, real estate, telecommunication industry, computer industry, and the list won’t end here. So, if you someone with an interest to work in multiple industries, then digital marketing is the best option for you as here you can easily work with various industries as well as the various trending profiles like a content writer, Digital marketing manager, SEO specialist, Google AdWords Specialist, Graphics designer, and Social Media Marketing. Also, you can see various Digital marketing jobs in Delhi on Job portals. Therefore, digital marketing is among one of the most lucrative career options in today’s world. You can easily see a lot of people looking to build a career in it, that will not only provide you with better career options and also a life that will change your way of living. Now, Let’s look at the top 10 Digital Marketing Institutes in central Delhi.

Top 10 Digital Marketing Institutes in Central Delhi

 

1. Digiperform

Digiperform is one of the leading digital marketing institutes in Central Delhi and is headquartered in Noida, Digiperform is one of the most trusted & leading brands in Digital Marketing Training that has trained over 24,000+ digital marketing professionals from all over India.   In today’s scenario, when digital marketing has become the most essential skill for everyone, Digiperform with its well-structured curriculum designed in LMS provides its trainees with the learning of all the various modules in digital marketing that helps its trainees to become an expert in the field of Digital Marketing. Being in the industry for more than 9 years, Digiperform with its highly considerable placement cell has helped many of its trainees to start with their Digital Marketing careers. To feel enchanted, Digiperform has been featured in well known online magazines – Yourstory Media – has featured an article under the title “Edtech start-up Digiperform raises $ 3.6 M from HT Media” stating the recent achievements and how excited they are to make the most of the same investment to pick up the pace of growth in the market and build huge brand awareness in the market. With the change in the education sector, where most of the institutes and organizations are coming online to provide educational content to their customers and students, Digiperform has effectively launched its Online course for its students through which the students can easily learn and upgrade their digital marketing skills. Now let discuss the Digiperform Course Curriculum:
Course Types:
Digiperform Certified Online Marketing Professional Course (dCOMPro) Digiperform Certified Online Marketing Practitioner(dCOMP) Digiperform Certified Digital Marketing Planner (dCDMP)
Course Syllabus & Modules
Digiperform offers its Certified Online Marketing Professional Course with its 25+ Modules i.e
  • Marketing & Web Presence Foundation Module ( 5 Modules)
  • Online Business Visibility Creation (6 Modules )
  • Lead Generation (5 Modules)
  • Lead Nurturing (4 Modules)
  • Personal Branding & Online Earning (4 Modules)
  • Interview Preparation (1 Module)
  • 8 Masterclass
  • 3 Capstone Projects With 9 Specialization Badges

Course Highlights

  • 100% Job Assistance
In today’s world, when you can a lot of Competitive & everyone needs a secure job for their future. Digiperform is the only digital marketing institute that provides you with 100% job assistance to their trainees. So, while choosing the digital marketing course from Digiperform, you don’t have to worry about the job placement as they fulfill what they promise.
  • Tools based Learning
With the advancement of technology where every single thing is handled with the tools and software, Digiperform is the only training company that will enable you to get the experience to learn and handle 100+ live tools which are most commonly used by the marketing professionals and experts over the years.
  • Live Practical Sessions
To make you understand digital marketing more effectively, Digiperform provides you with live training sessions that will help you to understand the topic easily whenever required.
  • Industry’s Top Trainers
Learning digital marketing from the best industry experts is like a blessing, at Digiperform you will be get trained by the top industry professionals/trainers who will support you at every problem to achieve excellence in all parameters such as SEO, SMM, PPC, Social Media Marketing, Email Marketing, Google Ads and Affiliate Marketing, etc to meet your desired goals.
  • Free Doubt Session and Backup Classes
At Digiperform, you will get an opportunity to ask the right questions about the marketing anytime in the doubt session, also with it in case if you have missed any of your classes Digiperform trainers will provide you with the backup class for the same.
  • Weekday/ Weekend/ Sunday Only Batch
Keeping in mind the busy schedule, Digiperform has provided its trainees with the special flexible time to provide training, where you can join the course according to your convenience and simultaneously engage with your business and other activities while taking the course.
  • PAN India Presence 
With the efficient growth of Digiperform, it has covered almost every city across Asia with the major aim to provide the knowledge of digital marketing to every individual. To date, it has almost 40+ centers making its presence all over India.
  • Award-Winning LMS 
To help its trainees learn digital marketing, it provides you with the best curriculum, certification, and 24*7 LMS designed for its trainees where you will easily get the course PPT’s, recording quizzes, self- half tutorials, and forums available only to the registered students for getting answers to all queries related to marketing.
  • Affordable Fees Structure 
It provides you with the fee structure that you can easily afford as compared to that of its competitors. Whether you are an Under-graduates, graduate, working professional, freelancer, housewife, and entrepreneur, you can easily afford the price for the course given to you at Digiperform to make a winning career.
  • High Quality of Training 
All the training modules provided to you at Digiperform are highly concerned about the quality where you will get the various training modules provided you are by the industry experts to make sure that it meets all major industry standards. Also, you will always get the latest skills and new technologies in the digital marketing industry.
  • Makes you an expert in the Digital domain
Once you have completed the digital marketing course from Digiperform, you will be able to apply for the job in big organizations and reputed ad agencies. Also, the major benefit that you will get after completing the course is that you will be able to choose multiple areas of digital marketing as per your skills and interest.

Who can do this Course?

  • Student & Jobseeker
If you are a student and looking forward to starting your career, pursuing the digital marketing course will be the best option for you as it will help you get the job in the various details with a high salary package. 
  • Marketing Sales and Professionals
With the help of a digital marketing professional course, you will be easily able to upskill yourself for a better salary and career opportunities in the various digital marketing modules like SEO, SMM, Online Advertising, Google Analytics, Sales Optimization & Online Earning.
  • Business Owners and Entrepreneurs 
As a business owner and entrepreneur, with the help of digital marketing courses, you can grow your business and boost your revenue at a fast pace. Along with it, you can also target the most desired audience that you have set for your business. 
  • Digital Marketing Professionals 
Although, if you are already a digital marketing individual with the help of a digital marketing course you can easily upgrade your existing skills and knowledge. 
  • Housewives and Freelancers
If you are a homemaker to earn the extra income while sitting at home then enrolling in the digital marketing course will be the most advantageous step for you as here you can easily provide your digital marketing services to various clients from all around the world as well as you can also build your brand, earn as an affiliate marketer, make money with blogging, and start your own eCommerce business that will help you earn the huge income from home.  

Reasons Why You Should Join Digiperform?

Here are some of the happy reviews of our trainees that will help you to make a better choice for choosing the digital marketing course. View More: Digiperform Best Reviews  Contact Details Phone: +91- 852-761-1500 Address: Suite 29, H-Block, Indra Palace, Middle Circle, Connaught Place, New Delhi, Delhi 110001 Email: contact@digiperform.com  

2. Internet Marketing School

Founded in 2016 by the CEO of IMS Group, Mr. Sanjay Singhania, Internet Marketing School has become one of the most leading hubs for providing the best industry-dominating digital marketers. The best thing that you can see about the Internet Marketing Institute is that they tend to provide both online & offline classes with their existing curriculum for freshers, jobseekers, working professionals, entrepreneurs, and business owners. Internet marketing school is one of the popular digital marketing institutes in Central Delhi and here you will go through the course types and many more in the guide, The ISO & Google partner training institute has certified over 6000+ students and placed above 4000+ of its trainees. Though, it owns its own dedicated placement cell and esteemed industry association to take care of the placement.
Digital Marketing Course Types:
Hybrid Online and Offline classroom sessions with practical exposure.
Course Syllabus & Modules
  • Website Planning & Development
  • Search Engine optimization
  • SEM (Google Ads)
  • Web Analytics
  • Social Media Marketing
  • Content Marketing
  • Email Marketing
  • Inbound Marketing
  • Make Money Online
  • Mobile Marketing
  • E-commerce Marketing
  • Google Data Studio
Course Highlights
  • Backup Classes
  • 100% Placement Support
  • Small Batch Sizes
  • Live – Instructor Live Session
  • Get Secured with Certification
  • 24*7 Support from the Trainers
  • Easy EMI options

3. Digital Vidya

Founded in the year 2009 by Pradeep Chopra and Kapil Nakra, digital vidya is among the most dominant digital marketing training institutes in India and worldwide. Digital Vidya is a well-established brand in digital marketing and now is one of the top digital marketing institutes in Central Delhi. Since the day it has been launched, it has trained over 38,000+ professionals from the brands like Nokia, Google, eBay, Reliance, Star TV, Cisco, Intel, ITC, and so on in more than 3,800 training batches conducted by Digital Vidya. Being the official training partner of Google & Microsoft India and has a partnership with Global Social Media giants like Facebook, LinkedIn, NASSCOM, and Vskills, it has an expert panel of over 70 trainers where each trainer is an expert in one specific niche skill i.e Search Engine Optimization, Search Engine Marketing, Email Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Inbound Marketing, E-commerce Marketing, etc.
Course Types:
Online & Offline Classroom Training
Course Syllabus & Modules:
  • Search Engine optimization (4 Modules)
  • Search Engine Marketing (5 Modules)
  • Social Media Marketing (5 Modules)
  • Email Marketing (3 Modules)
  • Inbound Marketing (4 Modules)
  • Web Analytics (5 Modules)
  • Facebook Marketing (2 Modules)
  • Other Digital Marketing Topics (15 Modules)
Course Fee:
INR 49,900 + Service tax
Course Highlights:
  • Best Industry Trainers
  • Practical Sessions
  • Updated Digital Marketing Course Recording
  • Digital Marketing Course Lifetime Updates

4. Techstack Academy

Established in 2012, Techstack Academy (Reyedin Techstack Pvt. Ltd) is a Delhi-based training center that provides you with various courses to its students to upgrade their skills in a specific field. Being in the industry for more than 10 + years, it has also developed full-fledged courses into the other niche that provides you with quality training not only in digital marketing but also in Big Data Hadoop, Web Designing, and Development with quality training, smart classes, and 100% placement assistance. However, Techstack has many reasons to stand in the best digital marketing institutes in Central Delhi that you will explore below including the course highlights.
Course Type:
Post Graduate Diploma in Digital Marketing
Course Syllabus & Modules
  • Initialization to Digital Marketing
  • Website Planning
  • Content Writing
  • Search Engine Optimization
  • Local SEO
  • Google Webmaster
  • Bing Webmaster
  • SMO (Social Media Optimization)
  • Google Analytics
  • Search Engine Marketing
  • Email Marketing, etc.
Course Highlights
  • Redefined Career
  • 100% Job Placement Assistance
  • Business Increased Revenue
  • 17 Certification Guaranteed

5. Digital Academy India

Digital Academy India is among the leading digital marketing training institute in central Delhi that has trained more than 5,000+ professionals and students from over India and is consistently working to offer the best digital marketing course to empower individuals for both personal as well as professional growth. With the enhancement of the digital marketing industry, digital academy India ensures to provide tangible skills that can easily be translated to today’s evolving marketing landscape that will help them to understand and negotiate the world they live in. DAI is a leading digital marketing training institute that includes comprehensive courses as well.
Digital Marketing Course Types: Professionals & Entrepreneurs
  • Digital Marketing Certification Course – CPDM
  • Google Adwords Certification Courses
  • Certified Digital Marketing Associate Course
Short Courses
  • Social Media & Mobile Marketing Course
  • Certification in Search Marketing
Course Syllabus & Modules
  • Search Engine Marketing
  • Social Media Marketing
  • Search Engine Optimization
  • Email Marketing
  • Web Analytics
  • Integrated Digital Marketing Communications
Course Highlights
  • Lifetime Membership to access the recent recordings of the sessions
  • Lifetime Alumni Membership
  • Full Placement Support
  • Weekday or Weekend Instructor-Led Online

6. Manipal Prolearn

Part of Manipal Global Education Services, Manipal Prolearn offers a wide range of professional programs such as Digital Marketing, data science, project management, and finance domains. The digital marketing course content includes all the major platforms and verticals, such as search engines, social media, email, affiliate marketing, and others with the real-world scenarios, live ventures, webinars, and case – studies that will help you to learn the basic principles and prepare you to work in the relevant area. Manipal is a brand and that is a strong reason to get listed in the top digital marketing institutes in Central Delhi.
Digital Marketing Course Types:
M.A. in Digital & Creative Marketing Postgraduate Degree
Course Syllabus & Modules
  • SEO
  • Social Media Marketing
  • Affiliate Marketing
  • Online Advertising
  • Marketing Analytics
  • Content Marketing
  • Website Designing

7. Delhi Institute of Digital Marketing – (DIDM )

With over 12 years of expertise in the field of digital marketing, Delhi institute is a renowned digital marketing company located in Delhi to fulfill the demand for digital marketing skilled professionals. Trained over 7,000 students and have been recognized by ASSOCHAM as the “Most Promising Brand”, DIDM commits to provide quality training with its advanced digital marketing courses and in-depth knowledge of digital marketing strategies to meet the growing demands of skilled individuals across the world. DIDM is a popular institute and has several reasons to stand in the best digital marketing institutes in Central Delhi that are mentioned below.
Course Types:
  • Master in Digital Marketing
  • Advanced in Digital Marketing
  • Professional in Digital Marketing
Course Syllabus & Modules
  • Email Marketing
  • Google Adwords
  • Online Reputation Management
  • Affiliate Marketing
  • Social Media Marketing
  • Search Engine Optimization
  • Google Adsense
Course Fee:
Rs. 48, 490/-
Course Highlights
  • Full Placement Support
  • Career Counselling
  • Interview Preparation
  • Free Tools and Software
  • One to One Industry Session
  • Online and Offline Assessments

8. Digital Marketing Profs

Part of Jeetech Academy, Digital Marketing Profs, provides a variety of professional certification courses across Digital Marketing, web design graphic design, data science, and so on. With 10+ years of industry experience, digital marketing profs have trained more than 5500 candidates with the help of both online and offline mediums. They offer specialized digital marketing training to various students looking for work, entrepreneurs looking to expand their company online, and also to college and corporate agencies in Delhi. Digital Marketing Profs include many features to provide their students and a learning atmosphere that counts them in the top digital marketing institutes in Central Delhi.
Course Types:
Advanced Digital Marketing course Master Digital Marketing Course
Course Syllabus & Modules
  • Digital Marketing Overview
  • Internet Basics Overview
  • Keyword Research Advanced Techniques
  • SEO Content Creation
  • Website Designing Basics
  • Search Engine Optimization
  • Google webmaster tool
  • Social Media Optimization
  • Search Engine Marketing
  • Google Analytics
  • Mobile Marketing and so on.
Course Highlights
  • Work on Live Projects
  • Live Projects
  • Expert Mentors

9. Learning Catalyst

Based in Kalkaji, Learning Catalyst provides a comprehensive Digital Marketing course for minors, graduates, and working professionals. Being one of the biggest digital marketing institutes in Delhi, it provides its trainees with unlimited access to all course content where the course is accompanied by practical assignments, summer and winter internship placements, and freelancing support. However, it seems that learning catalyst is occupied with a lot of features that are required for a student to get advanced learning. Hence, Learning Catalyst is a popular digital marketing training institute.
Course Types:
  • Classroom Courses
  • Online Courses
Course Syllabus & Modules
  • Internet Marketing
  • Social Media Optimization
  • Basics of Google Adwords
  • SEO Tools and Tech Issues
  • Competition Analysis
  • Keyword Research & Campaign Structure and so on.
Course Fee:
Classroom Cost: 36,650/- + tax Online Cost:  25,000/- + tax

10. Expert Training Institute

Started in 2012 by Mr. Udit Khurana, the expert training institute provides a flexible learning place and has trained more than 30,000 candidates in over 1973 batches. With 100% placement support and 10+ live projects, an expert training institute with one-to-one mentoring offers a digital marketing course certificate after successfully completing the class. Expert Training Institute is an established brand and has trained many students across Delhi. Therefore, it is listed in the top digital marketing institutes in Central Delhi.
Course Types:
  • Digital Marketing Course
  • SEO Course
  • PPC Course
Course Syllabus & Modules
  • Digital Marketing Overview
  • Website Designing Overview
  • Search Engine Optimization
  • Pay Per Click
  • Social Media Optimization
  • Advance Google Analytics
  • Mobile Marketing
  • Ecommerce Marketing & etc.
Course Fee:
Rs. 6,999/-
Course Highlights
  • Live Class Videos
  • Flexible Batches
  • Doubt Session Class
  • Lifetime Assistance
  • 24*7 Support

Conclusion

With the popularity of Digital Media, it would be beneficial for you to pursue a digital marketing course as it has a great career option where it provides a competitive advantage to build a career in the digital marketing sphere. This is all about the top 10 digital marketing institutes in Central Delhi and we hope, this article is helpful for you. You may feel free to comment below for any query and we would be happy to help you at our earliest.    

Step into the Journey of Digital Marketing With Best Training Insitute in Central Delhi
